title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 212.3 - Conduct of hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 212.3 - Conduct of hearings

State Regulations

Hearings shall be open to the public unless otherwise ordered
by the administrative law judge. It shall be the duty of the administrative law
judge to inquire fully into all matters at issue and to obtain a full and
complete record. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
212.3

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
